lead_paragraph: CHESTLER--Rita. I lost the love of my life at 1:45am today. After 68 years, three wonderful children, seven fabulous grandchildren, I experienced the best life anyone could wish for. This was the hardest moment anyone could expect. What a team we were and will always be. I love this family more than life can imagine. Thanks to all of you. I love you, Herb 1/3
